com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.event.dto

Interface PulseCommentEvent


  • public interface PulseCommentEvent
    Describes the review comment event that has occurred.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PulseCommentAction getAction() 
      String getBody() 
      String getChangesetId()
      SCM identifier of the changeset the file belongs to.
      Date getDate() 
      int getEndLine()
      If the comment is on a file, this is the end line number within the file the comment applies to.
      String getFileScmId()
      If the comment is on a file this is the SCM identifier for the file.
      String getLoginName() 
      String getPath()
      If the comment is on a file this is the path to the file.
      String getPreviousBody() 
      String getResponseId()
      If the comment is a response to another comment, this is the unique identifier of the response.
      String getReviewLabel()
      If the comment was made in the context of a review, this is the review label.
      int getStartLine()
      If the comment is on a file, this is the starting line number within the file the comment applies to.
      String getThreadId() 

    • Method Detail

      • getAction

        PulseCommentAction getAction()
        Returns:
        Type of action that occurred to the comment.

      • getThreadId

        String getThreadId()
        Returns:
        Unique identifier for the comment thread.

      • getDate

        Date getDate()
        Returns:
        Date the comment or response was made.

      • getLoginName

        String getLoginName()
        Returns:
        Login for the user who made the comment or response.

      • getResponseId

        String getResponseId()
        If the comment is a response to another comment, this is the unique identifier of the response. The threadId holds the identifier of the thread that this comment belongs to.
        Returns:
        Identifier of the comment this is a response to or null if not a response.

      • getReviewLabel

        String getReviewLabel()
        If the comment was made in the context of a review, this is the review label.
        Returns:
        Label of the review or null if the comment is made outside of a review.

      • getBody

        String getBody()
        Returns:
        Current body of the comment. Valid only for PulseCommentAction.CREATED and PulseCommentAction.EDITED events.

      • getPreviousBody

        String getPreviousBody()
        Returns:
        Previous body of the comment. Valid only for PulseCommentAction.EDITED and PulseCommentAction.DELETED events.

      • getPath

        String getPath()
        If the comment is on a file this is the path to the file.
        Returns:
        File path or null if not a comment on a file.

      • getFileScmId

        String getFileScmId()
        If the comment is on a file this is the SCM identifier for the file.
        Returns:
        SCM identifier of the file or null if not comment is not for a file.

      • getChangesetId

        String getChangesetId()
        SCM identifier of the changeset the file belongs to. Only valid if the comment is about a file.
        Returns:
        Changeset SCM identifier or null if not comment is not for a file.

      • getStartLine

        int getStartLine()
        If the comment is on a file, this is the starting line number within the file the comment applies to. If the comment is not on a file, then this will be 0.
        Returns:
        First line in the file the comment applies to.

      • getEndLine

        int getEndLine()
        If the comment is on a file, this is the end line number within the file the comment applies to. If the comment is on a single line, then this will be the same as the start line number. If the comment is not on a file, then this will be 0.
        Returns:
        Last line in the file the comment applies to.
